bibl.title: Papyrus Editions.
bibl.note: This list brings up to date the lists of editions of papyri and ostraca which appeared in: G.S.R. Thomas, Papyrus Editions Held in Australian Libraries; 2nd ed. revised by S.R. Pickering (North Ryde, 1974).
